name: Crystal Caverns (itch) (One Month Games)
description:
In Crystal Caverns the goal is to hit the crystal spaces with the correct light to progress to the next level. 

Lights can mix and form new colors.

There are currently 25 levels to play through. Your progress will be saved, so you don't need to complete in one session.

This is a two person project completed in one month.

Our goal is to continue to make 1 game per month, so please check back for more!

Everything except what is sourced below was created by us.

Please leave a comment with feedback.
